value.name: Shooting death prompts questions about CMPD’s tactics
value.description: The fatal shooting of a mentally ill woman in February is prompting questions about how Charlotte-Mecklenburg police officers handled a confrontation as they arrived at her apartment north of uptown. Janisha Fonville, 20, died after being shot inside her ...

value.name: Woman shot, killed by Charlotte officer, no charges expected
value.description: according to Charlotte-Mecklenburg Police Chief Rodney Monroe. Police say officer Anthony Holzhauer shot 20-year-old Janisha Fonville twice after she charged at the officer with a knife. Police say they have responded to her home multiple times in the past.

value.name: Woman Killed in Officer-Involved Shooting | Charlotte Observer
value.description: A 20-year-old woman is dead after an officer-involved shooting in northeast Charlotte Wednesday night. Police identified the dead woman as Janisha Fonville. She was shot and killed on Bellafonte ...
